Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Relationships of Wollamide Cyclic Hexapeptides with Activity against Drug-Resistant and Intracellular Mycobacterium tuberculosis
Literature.Author: Khalil ZG, Hill TA, De Leon Rodriguez LM, Hoang HN, Reiling N, Hillemann D, Brimble MA, Fairlie DP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium bovis BCG(IC50=10µM),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=30µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW620(IC50=>30µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H460(IC50=>30µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=>30µM)
